weeklyRest.title: Weekly Rest Pay Calculator
weeklyRest.description: Calculate weekly rest pay for 40-hour work week. (2026 standard)

result.formula: Formula: (Daily Wage × Weekly Work Days) ÷ Weekly Scheduled Days × 1 Day
result.note: For 40-hour work week, weekly rest pay is equivalent to 1 day divided by weekly scheduled work days.

annualLeave.title: Annual Leave Pay Calculator
annualLeave.description: Calculate unused annual leave pay. (2026 standard)
annualLeave.enterDays: Please enter unused annual leave days.

result.formula: Formula: (Monthly Salary ÷ Monthly Scheduled Days) × Unused Annual Leave Days
result.note: Annual leave pay is equivalent to average wage.
Overtime pay is 1.5 times hourly wage or 50% added to daily wage.
